full_summary:
###  Autoclave Maintenance and Repair Services

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Announcement

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01009825
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 1000244102
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-12
**Tender Closure Date:** 2022-11-22T14:00:00

The National Microbiology Laboratory Guelph (NML Guelph) located at 110 Stone Rd W in Guelph, Ontario, Canada, is seeking the services of an experienced Autoclave Technician for the provision of autoclave maintenance and repair services on a scheduled and “as and when” requested basis.

**Statement of Work**

The Contractor must possess experience working on equipment technically comparable to the units detailed in the statement of work. Key responsibilities include:

* Providing security-cleared, skilled Autoclave Technicians
* Conducting regular maintenance and scheduled repairs on autoclaves
* Ensuring compliance with relevant regulatory requirements

**Contract Period & Options**

The anticipated contract period is from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2025, with three (3) additional twelve (12) month option periods.

**Procurement Details**

* **GSIN Code:** JX6640
* **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR)

**Contracting Entity Information**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Health Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K9, Canada

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name:** Montana Myers
* **Contact Email:** [montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** None
* **Contact Fax:** None

**Document Attachments**

* [Autoclave Maintenance and Repair Service Tender] {link to document}: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/17/
